desc: High Security Bolt Seals and High Security Cable Seals. Tamper Evident Plastic and Tin Seals.

layout.text: In business since 2008. All prices are in USD and include FREE Shipping and taxes. We have stock in Toronto, Vancouver, Los Angeles and Chicago and all prices include FREE shipping by FedEx or Local Courier. Large orders are shipped by Pallet on a truck. Please click on the products button at the top to see our full product line. All Bolt and Cable Seals are ISO 17712 And CTPAT Approved.
